h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
content: When you get to the top, turn right and look for the stairs on the left just up ahead. Go down these and straight across into the building.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Snow Fox' and the sub-subsection 'Returning to Fox Form'.
The content is as follows:
When you get to the top, turn right and look for the stairs on the left just up ahead. Go down these and straight across into the building.
